features.name: Frontend Independent
features.description: Supports any frontend framework, allowing users to bring existing web stacks or start new projects without changing their current stack.

features.name: Cross Platform
features.description: Enables building applications for Linux, macOS, Windows, Android, and iOS from a single codebase. Frontend can be written in JavaScript, application logic in Rust, with deep system integration using Swift and Kotlin.

features.name: Maximum Security
features.description: Security is a top priority for the Tauri Team, driving priorities and innovations.

features.name: Minimal Size
features.description: Achieves small application sizes (as little as 600KB) by utilizing the operating system's native web renderer.
